title: Why is my Pixel 4a 5G only connecting Bluetooth audio, but not for Bluetooth phone calls?
content:
After the normal pairing process, my phone will show as connected via Bluetooth. However only BT audio will work consistently. BT phone functionality will not work (incoming/outgoing phone calls will not go through Bluetooth). 

If I go into the Bluetooth settings for the connected device profile, the Phone Calls toggle isn't even listed. 

I have deleted and re-paired multiple times, and it still won't work. I have tried on multiple cars with the same issue.
